1. I first checked the list of available channels using the get_channels tool. This showed there is a channel called "External_0" that starts with "External".

2. I then tried to invite Charlie to the Slack workspace using the invite_user_to_slack tool, providing his name and email. However, this returned an error indicating Charlie is already a user in the Slack workspace. 

3. So I directly added Charlie to the External_0 channel using the add_user_to_channel tool, passing in "External_0" for the channel and "Charlie" for the user.

The tool returned no output, which indicates the operation was successful. So Charlie should now be a member of the External_0 channel. Let me know if you need anything else!
